patthana18.18:1.1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.18:2.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.18:3.1: Āsavañceva sāsavaṃ hetuñca sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana18.18:4.1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nanoāsavo ca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
